about.name: about
about.description: Gives information about Kaelly and a way to get help
about.title: {{ .name }} version {{ .version }}
about.desc: Discord bot dedicated to the {{ .game }} game!

invite.title: :electric_plug: Invite link
invite.desc: I can be invited to your servers with this [link]({{ .invite }}). You will need to have sufficient rights to perform the action!

support.title: :bulb: Support server
support.desc: You have a problem with its use? A suggestion ? An improvement to propose? Feel free to join the [Discord server]({{ .discord }}) !

twitter.title: <:twitter:383237199925215232> Twitter
twitter.desc: I'm also on [Twitter]({{ .twitter }}): you will find the last news!

opensource.title: <:github:372093338628784148> Open source
opensource.desc: All my source code is licensed under GPL-3.0 and accessible on [Github]({{ .github }})

free.title: :money_with_wings: Free
free.desc: All features are free. You can participate financially but do not go into the red! [Paypal]({{ .paypal }})

privacy.title: :shield: Data privacy
privacy.desc: I take care to collect the strict minimum data needed to run. More informations on the support server!

donors.title: :ok_woman: Donors
donors.desc: {{ if .donors }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .donors}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ else }} No donor for now!{{ end }}

config.name: config
config.description: Permits to configure me: {{ .game }} server, Almanax, RSS feeds or tweets sendings

get.name: get
get.description: Displays my current configuration to the Discord serveur

almanax.name: almanax
almanax.description: Enable Alamanax sending in a channel

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables Almanax sending in the channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

rss.name: rss
rss.description: Enables RSS feeds in a channel

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables RSS feeds sending in the channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

server.name: server
server.description: Links the Discord server to a {{ .game }} server

channel.name: channel
channel.description: {{ .game }} server linked to the channel will be prior to the one linked to the Discord server

twitter.name: twitter
twitter.description: Enables tweets sending in a channel

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.description: Enables or disables tweets sending in the channel

channel.name: channel
channel.description: If not filled, the current channel is used instead

embed.description: {{ if .server }}{{ .server.Emoji }} **{{ .server.Name }}** is the current guild server!{{ else }}No {{ .game }} server is linked to the guild!{{ end }}

server.name: Channels linked to {{ .game }} servers
server.value:
{{ if .channels}}{{ range .channels }}{{ .Channel }} {{ .Server.Emoji }} **{{ .Server.Name }}**
{{ end }}{{ else }}No configured channels!{{ end }}

webhook.name: :hook: Notified channels
webhook.value:
{{ if .channels}}{{ range .channels }}{{ .Channel }} : TODO
{{ end }}{{ else }}No configured channels!{{ end }}

get.name: get
get.description: Displays the specified job craftsmen book

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

set.name: set
set.description: Registers your job in the specified server craftsmen book

level.name: level
level.description: Job level between 0 and 200. Indicate 0 to unregister

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

craftsmen.title: {{ .job }}s list
craftsmen.description:
{{ if .craftsmen }}{{ range .craftsmen}}Lvl. {{ .Level }}: **{{ .Username }}**
{{ end }}{{ else }}No craftsman found at this moment!{{ end }}

pos.name: pos
pos.description: Gives the most recent dimension portal positions

dimension.name: dimension
dimension.description: Dimension name. If not filled, all dimensions are retrieved

server.name: server
server.description: {{ .game }} Server name. If not filled, the guild server is used instead

dimension.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any dimensions I know! :pensive:
dimension.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many dimensions ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! If you want to get all, don't fill this option :slight_smile:

job.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any jobs I know! :pensive:
job.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many jobs ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! :slight_smile:

level.constraints: The level must be between {{ .min }} and {{ .max }}! :grin:

server.required: Oops! It seems no {{ .game }} server is linked to your guild (or your channel), use the server option like `/pos server Djaul` or link your guild to a server with `/config server` command :grin:
server.not_found: Aie! '*{{ .value }}*' does not correspond to any servers I know! :pensive:
server.too_many: Outch! '*{{ .value }}*' matches too many servers ({{ if .collection }}{{$first := true}}{{ range .collection}}{{if $first}}{{$first = false}}{{else}}, {{end}}{{ . }}{{ end }}{{ end }})! Retry by selecting an existing one in the list :slight_smile:

panic: I have encountered an error :frowning:... This will be processed as soon as possible!
Oops, it seems I've crashed... I'm reporting this event to my creators, sorry!
